name: TWENGA S.A.
goal:
Twenga is a company created in 2006 and operating in 15 countries, mainly in Europe. Twenga is present in London, Berlin, Paris, Madrid and Milan
Twenga became rapidly the most comprehensive shopping search engine, on the web. Currently Twenga lists 400 millions e-commerce products in 15 countries.
In 2011, Twenga extended its activities with a program that offers contextual monetization solutions for publishers.
In 2015 Twenga launched a series of new advanced traffic acquisition solutions for e-merchants.
With 150 employees, Twenga is today a platform that delivers and tools to e-retailer advertisers, enabling them to capture more high value-added leads whilst allowing internet users find the right products at the best prices
euInitiatives: Procédure ouverte par la Commission européenne contre Google (AT 39.740)
